ErrorWhileCreatingData: An error occurred while creating the data.
ErrorWhileFetching: An error occurred while fetching data.
FileUrl: File must be uploaded before saving.
UploadFailed: An error occurred while uploading the file. The file is invalid.
EmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
InvalidDateRegular: Cannot enter data related to the regular context.
InvalidDateLisence: Cannot enter data related to licenses.
InvalidDateSteps: Cannot enter data related to steps.
FileOrUrlRequired: You must upload a file or provide a file URL.
ErrorWhileDeletingData: An error occurred while deleting data.
ErrorWhileUpdatingData: An error occurred while updating data.
ErrorWhileCreating: An error occurred while creating the developer.
ErrorWhileUpdating: An error occurred while updating the developer.
ErrorWhileDeleting: An error occurred while deleting the developer.
MaxImageSize5MB: Image size must not exceed 5 MB.
InvalidImageType: Invalid image type. Allowed: png, jpeg, jpg, ico, svg.
UnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred while retrieving properties.
PropertyNotFound: The requested property was not found.
InvalidFilter: The provided filter parameters are invalid.
NameEnglishAlphanumeric: Name (English) must contain only letters and numbers.
NameArabicAlphanumeric: Name (Arabic) must contain only Arabic letters or numbers.
CoverPhotoInvalid: Cover photo must be JPG, PNG, or SVG and not exceed 5 MB.
TotalSharesGreaterThan0: Total shares must be greater than 0.
UnitPriceGreaterThan0: Unit price must be greater than 0.
DownPaymentPercentRange: Down payment percentage must be between 0 and 100.
PlanDurationGreaterThan0: Plan duration (months) must be greater than 0.
CityNotFound: The specified city does not exist.
AreaNotFound: The specified area does not exist.
DeveloperNotFound: The specified developer does not exist.
DuplicatePropertyPrice: A property price with the same date, time, and amount already exists.
CannotDeleteDeveloperWithProperties: Cannot delete this developer because it is associated with properties.
InvalidDateFormat: Invalid date format. Please use dd-MM-yyyy.
PageNumberMustBeGreaterThanZero: Page number must be greater than zero.
InvalidPageSize: Page size must be between 1 and 200.
InvalidDateRange: The start date cannot be after the end date.
InvalidUrlFormat: URL must start with http://, https://, or www.
MaxSize5MB: File size must not exceed 5 MB.
MaxLength100ForReadTime: Read time must not exceed 100 characters.
PrivacyPolicyEnglishRequired: Privacy policy content (English) cannot be empty.
PrivacyPolicyArabicRequired: Privacy policy content (Arabic) cannot be empty.
PrivacyPolicyAlreadyExists: An active privacy policy already exists.
